about_the_game: Try a short playable demo of my game Paraplasm: Beyond the Veil, coming in 2024! Get ready to feel the fear in your bones!

content_descriptors.notes: Our game contains horror elements. It does not contain any sexual fantasy horror or sexual products, but you should keep in mind that this game is a psychological horror game.

detailed_description: Try a short playable demo of my game Paraplasm: Beyond the Veil, coming in 2024! Get ready to feel the fear in your bones!
name: Paraplasm: Beyond the Veil Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.20GHz)/AMD Ryzen 7 2700 (3.20GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.20GHz)/AMD Ryzen 7 2700 (3.20GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Try a short playable demo of my game Paraplasm: Beyond the Veil, coming in 2024! Get ready to feel the fear in your bones!
